message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product. I'm excited to start our negotiation. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $850000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still not convinced that $850000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $800000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your desire to meet in the middle, but I'm still not willing to compromise on the price. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $825000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and benefits, and I'm willing to stand firm on this offer.

I understand that you're trying to stand firm on the price, but I'm still not convinced that $825000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you at $795000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to make a serious commitment to purchase the product. However, I'm still not willing to compromise on the price. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $815000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and benefits, and I'm willing to stand firm on this offer.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $815000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you at $790000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions, and I'm willing to make a serious commitment to purchase the product at this price. I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting close to the deadline, and I'd like to reach a deal soon.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about reaching a deal soon, but I'm still not willing to compromise on the price. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $810000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's unique features and benefits, and I'm willing to stand firm on this offer. However, I'm willing to give you a small concession to show my willingness to reach a deal. I'm willing to throw in a few extra features that will increase the product's value even more.

I appreciate the extra features you're offering, Alice, but I'm still not convinced that $810000 is the right price. I'm willing to meet you at $785000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and the market conditions, and I'm willing to commit to purchasing the product at this price. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider buying the product from John for $1200000.
